meanings.definition: A person who perceives or is capable of perceiving.
meanings.sent1: The percipients in the room noticed the sudden change in temperature.
meanings.sent2: The percipients at the concert enjoyed the music and lights.
meanings.sent3: The percipients at the magic show were amazed by the disappearing act.
meanings.sent4: The percipients of the news felt a wave of excitement wash over them.
meanings.sent5: The percipients in the dark could hear the rustling of leaves nearby.

meanings.definition: Those who receive or are capable of receiving impressions or stimuli.
meanings.sent1: The percipients of the message understood its importance.
meanings.sent2: The percipients of the award were filled with gratitude.
meanings.sent3: The percipients of the surprise party were genuinely shocked.
meanings.sent4: The percipients of the gift felt appreciated and valued.
meanings.sent5: The percipients of the signal reacted swiftly to the incoming data.
